amendatorysection.catchline: Performance of Uniform Standards of Professional Appraisal Practice standard 3 appraisal review.
amendatorysection.para: Any employee of or independent contractor to an appraisal management company that performs a Uniform Standards of Professional Appraisal Practice standard 3 appraisal review shall be an appraiser with the proper level of licensure in this state. Quality control examinations are exempt from this requirement as they are not considered a standard 3 review.
